thread.section_title: Brumersbikes Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of brumersbikes.co.uk
thread.title: Darren Williams

author: Darren Williams
title: Darren Williams
text: I have been using Brumers bikes since they first started up and would never use anyone else, the service is top notch. Paul and Clare who i now consider friends are always willing to go the extra mile to make sure you get top quality service, Having used main agents before Brumers started for servicing, I can honestly say i would never use main agents again. Brumers have set the standard that other should aim for when it comes to customer service. well done guys.
